DBDRIVER.description: Primary database handler. Currently only sqlite3.

HERIKA_NAME.description: Custom name for Herika. Make sure it matches her NPC name in Skyrim.

PROMPT_HEAD.description: System Prompt. Defines the rules of the roleplay.

HERIKA_PERS.description: Follower Personality. Treat it like a DnD character bio.

CONTEXT_HISTORY.description: Amount of context history (dialogue and events) that will be pushed to LLM. More context => more tokens used, and slower processing speed in local LLMs.

CORE_LANG.description: Custom Language. A lang folder is in the Herika Server. Leave it blank for default english.

CONNECTORS.description: AI Service to use. Are used to connect with an AI service or program.

MAX_TOKENS_MEMORY.description: Maximum tokens to generate when summarizing, such as writing to diary.
Maximum tokens to generate when summarizing, such as writing to diary.

newline_as_stopseq.description: A newline in the output that will be considered a stop sequence. Recommended to leave it as default.

use_default_badwordsids.description: Unban End of Sentence (EOS) tokens. If set to false the LLM will stop generating when it detects an EOS token.

eos_token.description: EOS token LLM uses. Only works if use_default_badwordsids is enabled.

template.description: Prompt Format. Specified in the HuggingFace model card

MAX_TOKENS_MEMORY.description: Maximum tokens to generate when summarizing, such as writing to diary.
Maximum tokens to generate when summarizing, such as writing to diary.

TTSFUNCTION.description: Text-to-Speech service options. Used to generate your follower's voice.

region.description: Region location of your API key

URL.description: MIMIC3 Service URL. If using DwemerDistro, copy and paste [MIMIC3 Configuration] URL from the console window.

GCP_SA_FILEPATH.description: Google Cloud Platform auth file. Should be placed in the data folder.

STTFUNCTION.description: Speech-to-Text service options. Translates your voice to text.

API_KEY.description: OpenAI API key. Same used for OpenAI/ChatGPT AI service.

profanity.description: Specifies how to handle profanity in recognition results. Accepted values are:MASKED, which replaces profanity with asterisks. REMOVED, which removes all profanity from the result. RAW, which includes profanity in the result.

API_KEY.description: Azure API key. Same used for Azure TTS Service.

URL.description: Local whisper endpoint. Leave as Default.

ENABLED.description: Enable long term memory.  It uses ChromaDB and a text embedding provider to automatically store memories. It will then provide the most relevant memory with every AI response to be used as context.

CHROMADB_URL.description: ChromaDB Endpoint. Copy and paste the [CHROMADB REST-API] URL from the console window.

TEXT2VEC_URL.description: hugging-face-text-embedding API endpoint. Copy and paste the [TEXT2VEC REST-API] URL from the console window.

TEXT2VEC_PROVIDER.description: Remote will use OpenAI text-embedding-ada and needs your OpenAI API key. Local is the one provided by DwemerDistro

MEMORY_TIME_DELAY.description: Time in minutes to wait before using a memory in a prompt. Used to avoid pushing recent dialogues as memories. As that is covered by context history.

MEMORY_CONTEXT_SIZE.description: How many of the most relevant memory records will be injected in prompt.

AUTO_CREATE_SUMMARYS.description: Will summarize individual memory logs into larger ones. Is more accurate for memory recollection but will use up more tokens.

ENABLED.description: Enable Cost Monitoring. Currently only tracks OpenAI cost.

URL.description: URL of API. Should be displayed in DwemerDistro console window.

ADD_TIME_MARKS.description: Add timestamps to the context longs. Helps with memory recollection.
